## UseSessionStorageOptions type

Options to interact with session storage.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type UseSessionStorageOptions<T> = Omit<UseStorageOptions<T>, "storage">;
```
<b>References:</b> [UseStorageOptions](./react-hooks.usestorageoptions.md)
